testCases.label: Verify AppComponent instantiation
testCases.description: Uses Angular TestBed to create an instance of AppComponent and asserts that the created component instance is truthy, confirming successful initialization.

testCases.label: Verify AppComponent title property
testCases.description: Creates AppComponent through TestBed and asserts that its 'title' property equals 'event-emitter', confirming proper initialization of the title field.
